Hey,
Sorry to follow up on my own post, but I would really
love to be able to build Heritrix from source to test
some stuff I am doing to it right now. Below is my
original  post, and I would be very, very grateful for
any insight.
Best,
Yousef


--- Yousef Ourabi <yousef_ourabi@...> wrote:

> Hey,
> Sorry it took me so long to reply to my own
> question,
> I just got hit with my first round of midterms.
> 
> I made sure that I had all the plugins
> .maven/plugins/maven-sdocboc...etc
> .maven/repository/jimi/jars/jimi*jar
>
